main event: Citizens of St. John's reported a sighting of a light moving west to east on 6 April 1955.
interesting points: The light was observed at 22:15 local time,The observation lasted for 39 seconds,Reports were made to Captain Pearsley, an employee of a local radio station,The sighting involved an external light fastened to a C-134 engine for observation,No unusual meteorological or astronomical activity was reported at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: a light moving in the sky
